metadata.title: CVE-2017-17054 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In aubio 0.4.6, a divide-by-zero error exists in the functionnew_aubio_source_wavread() in source_wavread.c, which may lead to DoS whenplaying a crafted audio file.

criterions.comment: aubio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
